CustomField.formula: IF( OR( CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'Sales'), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'MSG Service Sales'), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'GBL Dell Services'), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'IT TA User'), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'System Administrator'), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'Contract Manager'), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'Services/CEM Mgr'), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'Contract Senior Manager'), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'CRM Support'), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'Dashboard/Report Admin') ), HYPERLINK('apex/PrintAccountPlan?Id=' & Id & '&retURL=' & Id, IMAGE('servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015A0000000TepX','Print Account Plan')), '[No Action Available]')
CustomField.label: Actions Available
